name: Gun Drops
description:
Get as many blue detonators as you can.
Get the + for more weapon

Controls

Single Stick:
Arrow keys to move
Z to shoot
X to toggle direction lock
or use gamepad

Dual Stick Sort Of:
Arrow keys to move
S, E, D, F to shoot
(doesn't support gamepad because we're using Pico 8's 2 player controls)

P: Pause Menu
From the pause menu you can swap move/shoot keys and turn on "autopause" for a more turn-based experience.

Made for 7DRL 2023

(A balance fix was uploaded post deadline. Judges may download the 7DRL bundle for twice the enemies, erratic upgrades, and no autopause)
